title: friend list gone
body:
as per title
i just logged in to find my friend list gone
anyone else experiencing this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you provide more information regarding your issue?

Are your friends missing? Or the whole friends tab is missing?

Could you try a [client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) and let me know if that helps at all.
